Name: Scout
Description: The Scout is hidden in the bushes and takes watch.

Name: Demolitionist
Description: The Demolitionist knows how to make bombs and blow up buildings or palisades. His skin is burned, but he is still smiling.

Name: Commander
Description: The Commander leads the troups into battle and is usually on a horse.

Name: Strategist
Description: The Strategist knows when to enter a village and how. He creates small battlemaps while still leading the charge in his heavy plate armor.

Name: Ration Keeper
Description: The Ration Keeper gives out food and water and is almost a small king among the Invaders.

Name: Polisher
Description: The Polisher makes sure that the equipment of the Invaders is clean and in good shape.

Name: Cannonist
Description: The Cannonist knows how to angle a cannon to hit the target.

Name: Warlord
Description: The Warlord has come to conquer and he will conquer. No one will stand in his way, when he comes with his traditional armor.

Name: Field Medic
Description: The Field Medic knows how to treat wounds that appear on the battlefield, but he doesn't know how to fight himself.

Name: Traveling Cook
Description: The Traveling Cook knows his way around poisons and is able to cook hearty meals that make your heart stop.

Name: Pillager
Description: The Pillager burns down anything he finds after he has taken all the valuables.

Name: Polymath
Description: The Polymath calculates the flight path of catapults and cannons and also knows about local fauna and flora. He is old and has grey hair.

Name: Wallclimber
Description: The Wallclimber knows how to climb any wall and is able to get over them easily.

Name: Archer
Description: The Archer is skilled with his bow and attacks from a distance.

Name: Foreign King
Description: The Foreign King wants to increase the size of his country and has therefore determined that your city will be included in his empire. For this he can chill in his throne room and his throne and wear his crown.

Name: Foreign Soldier
Description: The Foreign Soldier comes from another country and employs unknown fighting techniques and weaponry like scimitars.

Name: Flanker
Description: The Flanker comes from behind usually and is able to bring chaos to enemy troups.

Name: Brandisher
Description: The Brandisher knows how to swing around a multitude of weapons all at once, but he needs to be provided with them.

Name: Sharpener
Description: The Sharpener loves to sharpen swords, axes and arrow heads to maximize their impact.
